alert.note: Alert for Coastal Camden; Coastal Glynn; Inland Camden; Northeastern Charlton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 1:37PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Camden, southeastern Glynn and northeastern Charlton Counties through 215 PM EDT... At 136 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Woodbine, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Brunswick, St. Simons Island, Woodbine, Jekyll Island, Tarboro, Dover Bluff and Colesburg. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Camden; Coastal Glynn; Inland Camden; Northeastern Charlton
